external_references.description: Symantec Threat Intelligence. (2020, June 25). WastedLocker: Symantec Identifies Wave of Attacks Against U.S. Organizations. Retrieved May 20, 2021.

description: [Indrik Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0119) has used [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029) to stop services prior to the execution of ransomware.(Citation: Symantec WastedLocker June 2020)
